Author: Alexithymia115
Text: Have you ever tried the grey rock method? It's form of interacting with narcissistic personality types and abusers. You practice a flat face and show no emotion. Eventually they get tired of you or are less likely to Target you because what they want is your emotions. They want you to love them or be angry with them. But they are insecure and they want your attention. So you just don't give it to them. It's ok if you mess up in the beginning because eventually you get the hang of it. Beware though their behavior may escalate, this is called extinction burst behavior and it will go away just like a toddler's tantrums go away eventually.

Author: DuckieIsMyHero88
Text: My mom used to do that to me when I was in high school. But, she didn't know that the only time I would eat was dinner since I had to eat with them, so I just tried to ignore it. I'm sorry he's bothering you, hun. Keep your head up and try to not let it get to you.
